I programmed a basic thing to just run a Kraken to a set RPM but i’m wondering how I can add a smart dashboard output to show the actual rpm of the motor.

Here’s the code for reference.

U can get the RPM via a signal from the motor Status Signals

api.ctr-electronics.com

CoreTalonFX (CTRE Phoenix 6 Java 25.0.0-beta-1)

declaration: package: com.ctre.phoenix6.hardware.core, class: CoreTalonFX
